CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Web_First_Name__c)), Web_First_Name__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Contact.FirstName )), Contact.FirstName, IF( NOT(ISBLANK( LeadId__r.FirstName )), LeadId__r.FirstName, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(CaseId__r.Contact.FirstName)), CaseId__r.Contact.FirstName, IF( NOT(ISBLANK( CaseId__r.Lead__r.FirstName )), CaseId__r.Lead__r.FirstName, "" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: First Name
